android.car.media

类 CarAudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.media.CarAudioManager

  • public final class CarAudioManager
extends CarManagerBase
    APIs for handling audio in a car.

    In a car environment, we introduced the support to turn audio dynamic routing on /off by setting the "audioUseDynamicRouting" attribute in config.xml

    When audio dynamic routing is enabled: - Audio devices are grouped into zones - There is at least one primary zone, and extra secondary zones such as RSE (Reat Seat Entertainment) - Within each zone, audio devices are grouped into volume groups for volume control - Audio is assigned to an audio device based on its AudioAttributes usage

    When audio dynamic routing is disabled: - There is exactly one audio zone, which is the primary zone - Each volume group represents a controllable STREAM_TYPE, same as AudioManager

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int AUDIO_FEATURE_AUDIO_MIRRORING
      This is used to determine if audio mirroring is supported via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int) If enabled, audio mirroring can be managed by using the following APIs: setAudioZoneMirrorStatusCallback(Executor, AudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback), clearAudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback(), canEnableAudioMirror(), enableMirrorForAudioZones(List), extendAudioMirrorRequest(long, List), disableAudioMirrorForZone(int), disableAudioMirror(long), getMirrorAudioZonesForAudioZone(int), getMirrorAudioZonesForMirrorRequest(long)
      static int AUDIO_FEATURE_DYNAMIC_ROUTING
      This is used to determine if dynamic routing is enabled via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int)
      static int AUDIO_FEATURE_OEM_AUDIO_SERVICE
      This is used to determine if the OEM audio service is enabled via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int) If enabled, car audio focus, car audio volume, and ducking control behaviour can change as it can be OEM dependent.
      static int AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_EVENTS
      This is used to determine if volume group events is supported via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int) If enabled, the car volume group event callback can be used to receive event changes to volume, mute, attenuation.
      static int AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING
      This is used to determine if volume group muting is enabled via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int) If enabled, car volume group muting APIs can be used to mute each volume group, also car volume group muting changed callback will be called upon group mute changes.
      static int AUDIO_MIRROR_CAN_ENABLE
      This will be returned by #canEnableAudioMirror() and determines that it is possible to enable audio mirroring using the #enableMirrorForAudioZones(List)
      static int AUDIO_MIRROR_OUT_OF_OUTPUT_DEVICES
      This will be returned by #canEnableAudioMirror() and determines that it is not possible to enable audio mirroring using the #enableMirrorForAudioZones(List).
      static int AUDIO_REQUEST_STATUS_APPROVED
      Use to inform media request callbacks about approval of a media request
      static int AUDIO_REQUEST_STATUS_CANCELLED
      Use to inform media request callbacks about cancellation of a pending request
      static int AUDIO_REQUEST_STATUS_REJECTED
      Use to inform media request callbacks about rejection of a media request
      static int AUDIO_REQUEST_STATUS_STOPPED
      Use to inform media request callbacks about the stop of a media request
      static java.lang.String AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_RECEIVE_DUCKING_EVENTS
      Extra for AudioAttributes.Builder#addBundle(Bundle): when used in an android.media.AudioFocusRequest, the requester should receive all audio focus events, including AudioManager#AUDIOFOCUS_LOSS_TRANSIENT_CAN_DUCK.
      static java.lang.String AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_REQUEST_ZONE_ID
      Extra for AudioAttributes.Builder#addBundle(Bundle): when used in an android.media.AudioFocusRequest, the requester should receive all audio focus for the the zone.

      • AUDIO_FEATURE_OEM_AUDIO_SERVICE

        public static final int AUDIO_FEATURE_OEM_AUDIO_SERVICE
        This is used to determine if the OEM audio service is enabled via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int)

        If enabled, car audio focus, car audio volume, and ducking control behaviour can change as it can be OEM dependent.

      • AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING

        public static final int AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING
        This is used to determine if volume group muting is enabled via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int)

        If enabled, car volume group muting APIs can be used to mute each volume group, also car volume group muting changed callback will be called upon group mute changes. If disabled, car volume will toggle master mute instead.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AUDIO_MIRROR_OUT_OF_OUTPUT_DEVICES

        public static final int AUDIO_MIRROR_OUT_OF_OUTPUT_DEVICES
        This will be returned by #canEnableAudioMirror() and determines that it is not possible to enable audio mirroring using the #enableMirrorForAudioZones(List). This informs that there are no more audio mirror output devices available to route audio.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_EVENTS

        public static final int AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_EVENTS
        This is used to determine if volume group events is supported via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int)

        If enabled, the car volume group event callback can be used to receive event changes to volume, mute, attenuation. If disabled, the register/unregister APIs will return false.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AUDIO_FEATURE_AUDIO_MIRRORING

        public static final int AUDIO_FEATURE_AUDIO_MIRRORING
        This is used to determine if audio mirroring is supported via isAudioFeatureEnabled(int)

        If enabled, audio mirroring can be managed by using the following APIs: setAudioZoneMirrorStatusCallback(Executor, AudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback), clearAudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback(), canEnableAudioMirror(), enableMirrorForAudioZones(List), extendAudioMirrorRequest(long, List), disableAudioMirrorForZone(int), disableAudioMirror(long), getMirrorAudioZonesForAudioZone(int), getMirrorAudioZonesForMirrorRequest(long)

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_RECEIVE_DUCKING_EVENTS

        public static final java.lang.String AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_RECEIVE_DUCKING_EVENTS
        Extra for AudioAttributes.Builder#addBundle(Bundle): when used in an android.media.AudioFocusRequest, the requester should receive all audio focus events, including AudioManager#AUDIOFOCUS_LOSS_TRANSIENT_CAN_DUCK. The requester must hold Car.PERMISSION_RECEIVE_CAR_AUDIO_DUCKING_EVENTS; otherwise, this extra is ignored.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_REQUEST_ZONE_ID

        public static final java.lang.String AUDIOFOCUS_EXTRA_REQUEST_ZONE_ID
        Extra for AudioAttributes.Builder#addBundle(Bundle): when used in an android.media.AudioFocusRequest, the requester should receive all audio focus for the the zone. If the zone id is not defined: the audio focus request will default to the currently mapped zone for the requesting uid or CarAudioManager.PRIMARY_AUDIO_ZONE if no uid mapping currently exist.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAudioZoneMirrorStatusCallback

        public boolean setAudioZoneMirrorStatusCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                                AudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback callback)
        Registers audio mirror status callback
        参数:
        executor - Executor on which the callback will be invoked
        callback - Callback to inform about audio mirror status changes
        返回:
        true if audio zones mirror status is set successfully, or false otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if AudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback or Executor passed in are null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled, also if there is a callback already set
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if audio mirroring feature is disabled, which can be verified using isAudioFeatureEnabled(int) with the AUDIO_FEATURE_AUDIO_MIRRORING feature flag

      • isDynamicRoutingEnabled

        public boolean isDynamicRoutingEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether dynamic routing is enabled or not.

      • setGroupVolume

        public void setGroupVolume(int zoneId,
                           int groupId,
                           int index,
                           int flags)
        Sets the volume index for a volume group.
        参数:
        zoneId - The zone id whose volume group is affected.
        groupId - The volume group id whose volume index should be set.
        index - The volume index to set. See getGroupMaxVolume(int, int) for the largest valid value.
        flags - One or more flags (e.g., AudioManager#FLAG_SHOW_UI, AudioManager#FLAG_PLAY_SOUND)

      • reFixMixPolicy

        public void reFixMixPolicy(java.lang.String mixPolicyJson)
        指定音源与特定音源的策略关系
        参数:
        mixPolicyJson - [ { "zoneId": 0, "requestIndex=10, "currentIndex=11, "policyMode": 0, "policy": 2 //混音逻辑取值如下： SAME = 1,MIX = 2,STOP = 3,REJECT = 4,PAUSE = 5,MIX_DUCK1 = 6（当前源降低音量）,MIX_DUCK2 = 7(申请源降低音量); } ]

        public void setFadeTowardFront(float value)
        Adjust the relative volume in the front vs back of the vehicle cabin.
        参数:
        value - in the range -1.0 to 1.0 for fully toward the back through fully toward the front. 0.0 means evenly balanced.
        另请参阅:
        setBalanceTowardRight(float)

      • getExternalSources

        public java.lang.String[] getExternalSources()
        Queries the system configuration in order to report the available, non-microphone audio input devices.
        返回:
        An array of strings representing the available input ports. Each port is identified by it's "address" tag in the audioPolicyConfiguration xml file. Empty array if we find nothing.
        另请参阅:
        createAudioPatch(String, int, int), releaseAudioPatch(CarAudioPatchHandle)

      • isPlaybackOnVolumeGroupActive

        public boolean isPlaybackOnVolumeGroupActive(int zoneId,
                                             int groupId)
        Determines if a particular volume group has any audio playback in a zone
        参数:
        zoneId - The zone id whose volume group is queried.
        groupId - The volume group id whose associated audio usages is returned.
        返回:
        true if the group has active playback, false otherwise

      • createAudioPatch

        public CarAudioPatchHandle createAudioPatch(java.lang.String sourceAddress,
                                            int usage,
                                            int gainInMillibels)
        Given an input port identified by getExternalSources(), request that it's audio signal be routed below the HAL to the output port associated with the given usage. For example, The output of a tuner might be routed directly to the output buss associated with AudioAttributes.USAGE_MEDIA while the tuner is playing.
        参数:
        sourceAddress - the input port name obtained from getExternalSources().
        usage - the type of audio represented by this source (usually USAGE_MEDIA).
        gainInMillibels - How many steps above the minimum value defined for the source port to set the gain when creating the patch. This may be used for source balancing without affecting the user controlled volumes applied to the destination ports. A value of 0 indicates no gain change is requested.
        返回:
        A handle for the created patch which can be used to later remove it.
        另请参阅:
        getExternalSources(), releaseAudioPatch(CarAudioPatchHandle)

      • releaseAudioPatch

        public void releaseAudioPatch(CarAudioPatchHandle patch)
        Removes the association between an input port and an output port identified by the provided handle.
        参数:
        patch - CarAudioPatchHandle returned from createAudioPatch().
        另请参阅:
        getExternalSources(), createAudioPatch(String, int, int)

      • getOutputDeviceForUsage

        public AudioDeviceInfo getOutputDeviceForUsage(int zoneId,
                                               int usage)
        Gets the output device for a given AudioAttributes usage in zoneId.

        Note: To be used for routing to a specific device. Most applications should use the regular routing mechanism, which is to set audio attribute usage to an audio track.

        参数:
        zoneId - zone id to query for device
        usage - usage where audio is routed
        返回:
        Audio device info, returns null if audio device usage fails to map to an active audio device. This is different from the using an invalid value for AudioAttributes usage. In the latter case the query will fail with a RuntimeException indicating the issue.

      • isAudioFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isAudioFeatureEnabled(int audioFeature)
        Determines if an audio feature is enabled.
        参数:
        audioFeature - audio feature to query, can be AUDIO_FEATURE_DYNAMIC_ROUTING, AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING or AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_EVENTS
        返回:
        Returns true if the feature is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getInputDevicesForZoneId

        public java.util.List<AudioDeviceInfo> getInputDevicesForZoneId(int zoneId)
        Gets the input devices for an audio zone
        返回:
        list of input devices

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • registerCarVolumeCallback

        public void registerCarVolumeCallback(CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback callback)
        Registers a CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback to receive volume change callbacks
        参数:
        callback - CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback instance, can not be null

        Requires permission Car.PERMISSION_CAR_CONTROL_AUDIO_VOLUME

      • unregisterCarVolumeCallback

        public void unregisterCarVolumeCallback(CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback callback)
        Unregisters a CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback from receiving volume change callbacks
        参数:
        callback - CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback instance previously registered, can not be null

        Requires permission Car.PERMISSION_CAR_CONTROL_AUDIO_VOLUME

      • setBalanceTowardRightFront

        public void setBalanceTowardRightFront(int value)
        Adjust the relative volume ,and at the same time setting right and front balance

        Requires Car.PERMISSION_CAR_CONTROL_AUDIO_VOLUME permission.

        参数:
        value - in the range -7.0 to 7.0 for fully toward the back through fully toward the front. 0.0 means evenly balanced.
        另请参阅:
        setBalanceTowardRightFront(int)

      • setVolumeGroupMute

        public void setVolumeGroupMute(int zoneId,
                               int groupId,
                               boolean mute,
                               int flags)
        Sets a volume group mute

        Note: If AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING is disabled this will throw an error indicating the issue.

        参数:
        zoneId - The zone id whose volume groups will be changed.
        groupId - The volume group id whose mute state will be changed.
        mute - true to mute volume group, false otherwise
        flags - One or more flags (e.g., android.media.AudioManager#FLAG_SHOW_UI, android.media.AudioManager#FLAG_PLAY_SOUND)

      • isVolumeGroupMuted

        public boolean isVolumeGroupMuted(int zoneId,
                                  int groupId)
        Returns the whether a volume group is muted

        Note: If AUDIO_FEATURE_VOLUME_GROUP_MUTING is disabled this will always return false as group mute is disabled.

        参数:
        zoneId - The zone id whose volume groups is queried.
        groupId - The volume group id whose mute state is returned.
        返回:
        true if the volume group is muted, false otherwise

      • getVolumeGroupInfo

        public CarVolumeGroupInfo getVolumeGroupInfo(int zoneId,
                                             int groupId)
        Returns the volume group info associated with the zone id and group id.

        The volume information, including mute, blocked, limited state will reflect the state of the volume group at the time of query.

        参数:
        zoneId - zone id for the group to query
        groupId - group id for the group to query
        返回:
        the current volume group info
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the audio zone or group id are invalid

      • isMediaAudioAllowedInPrimaryZone

        public boolean isMediaAudioAllowedInPrimaryZone(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo info)
        Determines if audio from occupant is allowed in primary zone
        参数:
        info - Occupant zone info to query
        返回:
        true if audio playback from occupant is allowed in primary zone
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled

      • requestMediaAudioOnPrimaryZone

        public long requestMediaAudioOnPrimaryZone(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo info,
                                           java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                           MediaAudioRequestStatusCallback callback)
        Requests to play audio in primary zone with information contained in request
        参数:
        info - Occupant zone info whose media audio should be shared to primary zone
        executor - Executor on which callback will be invoked
        callback - Callback that will report the status changes of the request
        返回:
        returns a valid request id if successful or INVALID_REQUEST_ID otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of info, executor, or callback parameters are null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled, or if audio mirroring is currently enabled for the audio zone owned by the occupant as configured by #enableMirrorForAudioZones(List)

      • cancelMediaAudioOnPrimaryZone

        public boolean cancelMediaAudioOnPrimaryZone(long requestId)
        Cancels a request set by requestMediaAudioOnPrimaryZone
        参数:
        requestId - Request id to cancel
        返回:
        true if request is successfully cancelled
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled

      • registerCarVolumeGroupEventCallback

        public boolean registerCarVolumeGroupEventCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                                   CarVolumeGroupEventCallback callback)
        Registers a CarVolumeGroupEventCallback to receive volume group event callbacks
        参数:
        executor - Executor on which callback will be invoked
        callback - Callback that will report volume group events
        返回:
        true if the callback is successfully registered, false otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if executor or callback parameters is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if volume group events are not enabled

      • unregisterCarVolumeGroupEventCallback

        public void unregisterCarVolumeGroupEventCallback(CarVolumeGroupEventCallback callback)
        Unregisters a CarVolumeGroupEventCallback registered via registerCarVolumeGroupEventCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.media.CarVolumeGroupEventCallback)
        参数:
        callback - The callback to be removed
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if callback is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if volume group events are not enabled

      • setPrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback

        public boolean setPrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                                       PrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback callback)
        Sets a PrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestStatusCallback to listen for request to play media audio in primary audio zone
        参数:
        executor - Executor on which callback will be invoked
        callback - Media audio request callback to monitor for audio requests
        返回:
        true if the callback is successfully registered, false otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either executor or callback are null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is a callback already set

      • clearPrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback

        public void clearPrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback()
        Clears the currently set PrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if dynamic audio routing is not enabled
